results.title: Auto-immune neutropenia associated with metformin in a patient with splenic marginal zone lymphoma.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Immuno_hemolytic_anemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C538437 @@@Auto-immune neutropenia@@@ associated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with @DISEASE_Lymphoma_B_Cell_Marginal_Zone @DISEASE_MESH:D018442 @@@splenic marginal zone lymphoma@@@.

citations.NLM: Laporte F, Hamdi S, Oksman F, Huguet F. Auto-immune neutropenia associated with metformin in a patient with splenic marginal zone lymphoma. Pharm World Sci. 2008 Aug;30(4):319-21. PMID: 18392686

results.title: Metformin, A New Era for an Old Drug in the Treatment of Immune Mediated Disease?
results.text_hl: Due to its inhibitory effect on the proinflammatory phenotype of immune cells, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ seems to reduce @<m>DISEASE_Immuno_hemolytic_anemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C538437 @@@auto-immune disease@@@ burden not only in several animal models, but has also shown beneficial results in some @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ trials.

citations.NLM: Schuiveling M, Vazirpanah N, Radstake TRDJ, Zimmermann M, Broen JCA. Metformin, A New Era for an Old Drug in the Treatment of Immune Mediated Disease? Curr Drug Targets. 2018;19(8):945-959. PMID: 28606032
